function Docs() { return(


Documentation



Steam Games News App is a react project used to fetch and display news related to steam games. It allows users to search for games and view their latest updates in a modal interface.



If you want to open project localy, then after downloading you have to:

1. Run the server by typing "node server.js" in terminal

{/*list without using
    because why not*/}

    2. Run react app by typing "npm start" in terminal

    Searching for a Game Enter a game name in the search bar. Click "Search." Select a game to view its details in a modal. View News Click on a game to open the modal. If no news is available, the game will be non-interactive.

) } export default Docs
